sentences.english: Fangchenggang is a city of advantageous situation with abundant shore tourism resources.
sentences.chinese: 防城港市區位優勢顯著，濱海旅遊資源豐富。

sentences.english: Therefore this thesis will research on the future development planning of Fangcheng port.
sentences.chinese: 鑑此，本文對防城港的發展戰略規劃作出了研究。

sentences.english: Fangchenggang is a very convenient port.
sentences.chinese: 防城港是很便捷的出海口。
